title: Many Faces of Autism
description: Many Faces of Autism introduces students to the ongoing conversation surrounding autism and invites students into a deeper understanding of how they can support autistic family members, friends, and classmates. The book can also be used to identify cause-and-effect relationships and help students practice asking and answering questions as they read.
